Creative Director, Art Director & Graphic Designer

http://www.mcfarlin.me+ Graphic design: Expert knowledge of branding, layout, typography, color, and concept+ Digital design: Websites, presentations, email design, social media graphics, integrated campaigns & digital banners+ Print design: Design of printed materials, marketing collateral, offset and digital printing, hands-on experience working with printers+ Photography: Photo optimization,  photoshoot art directionCurrent Clients: Axon (Formerly Taser), Activate Health, Matrix Medical Network, Defero Digital Agency, The Lavidge Company, Intentional Foods, Schwarzkopf Hair Care Systems, Defero, Zari Life

Our mission is to provide our customers with natural, non-toxic + organic alternatives for your daily life with a modern beach style. Responsibly-sourced and never tested on animals, we strive to create products that make you feel good. All of our products are heavily influenced by our love of the ocean which offers endless inspiration. Made with: Natural ingredients, plant-based food-grade oils, essential oils, phalate-free and non-toxic fragrance oils, recyclable and reusable packaging, many certified organic ingredients. Made without: Toxic ingredients, parabens, sodium laurel sulfate, phthalates, chemicals, fillers, animal testing, mineral oils, petroleum.Sway Sundries was founded by Melissa and Clint McFarlin in their small garage and kitchen in Carlsbad, California.

Freelance remotely creating marketing materials based on their new brand standards. Work with core marketing team and produce sales sheets, email campaign templates, Powerpoint updates and designs, advertising print resizing, new ad templates and trade show booths.

Over 6 years as the Senior Art Director on national and regional brands. Created integrated campaigns that drove results for clients, such as, Republic Services, Dole, Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona, Leslie's Pools, Robson Ranch, Arizona Diamondbacks, 98.7FM Arizona Sports Network, Fox Sports, Phoenix Zoo, Meritage Homes, Isagenix, Massage Envy, Sanctuary Resort, Enchantment Resort, Golden Door Spa and many more. We consistently developed award-winning work through multiple mediums including: interactive design, social media, digital, video, motion graphics, print, public relations, graphic design, branding, package design, and results-driven marketing strategy. We developed campaigns targeting a wide range of demographics but have unique experience with the aging market, B2B and consumer product market. Highly experienced in art direction and planning on television and print shoots.

Worked as Senior Art Director creating advertising campaigns for consumer brands, rebranding efforts, B2B campaigns, interactive design, video production, internal rebranding and graphic design. Clients included LifeLock, American Express, Avnet.

recommendations: February 26, 2016, Jennifer worked with Melissa in different groups

Melissa truly is a creative delight to work with and always brought the ‘fun’ element to the media plan.  Her laugh and positivity was something that was always heard around the office.  Melissa really knows how to think strategically and enjoyed integrating with other teams and departments to execute the best campaign for the client.   I was fortunate to work on a new business pitch with Melissa and she thrived on digging deep into the research and how that helped create all aspects of a campaign from media to creative to digital.  She has some amazing, unique talents and is a rare find.  I am very fortunate to have worked with her for 6+ years and I hope our paths cross again.

Creative Director, W. L. Gore and Associates, Medical Products Division

I cannot praise Melissa enough. She is one of the most talented art directors I've ever worked with in my long career. Melissa always pushes people and clients to be better and looks for unique solutions to marketing problems – whether it be a social experience, ambient executions, more strategic media and digital applications – she'll pitch for it. She has exquisite taste and keeps up-to-date with design and marketing trends. I was always amazed at her ability to make quick design and editing decisions; her on-set demeanor and mad set-styling skills; her swift problem-solving and acumen, and sheer creative genious. Melissa is a true asset to whomever she works with and for.
